MAN.TITLE: integer corresponding to a binary form
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: integer corresponding to a binary form

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a string or a vector/matrix of strings containing only characters '1' and '0'
: a scalar or a vector/matrix of positives integers

DESCRIPTION.P: Given str a binary string, this function returns y the decimal number whose the binary representation is given by str ( y and str have the same size)
